ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: That is how We recompense good-doers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: That is how We reward those who do good.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Thus do We reward the good-doers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: In this way do We reward the righteous ones.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: This is how We reward the virtuous.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Verily, thus do We reward the doers of good.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Even thus do We reward the doers of good.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Even so We recompense the good-doers;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Lo! thus do We reward the good.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: It is thus indeed that We reward those who do good:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Verily We! thus We recompense the well-doers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Thus indeed do We reward the virtuous.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Thus indeed do We reward those who do right.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Verily, thus do We reward the Muhsinun (good-doers, who perform good deeds totally for Allah's sake only - see V. 2:112).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: As such We recompense the gooddoers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Indeed, We thus reward the doers of good.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [37:131] Indeed so — just as We rewarded him — do We reward the virtuous.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: 515 (Lo! thus do We reward the good) with words, deeds and good praise.
